price: Saka kapag nabiyak ang langit saka ito ay naging kulay rosas gaya ng kumukulong langis.
arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā inshaqqati al-samāu fakānat wardatan kal-dihāni
